product_name: The North Face Isotherm Shirt - Women's
long_description: Prepare for challenging cross-country ski workouts in The North Face Isotherm women's shirt. It uses a warm blend of merino wool and FlashDry(TM) fibers to help regulate your core temperature. Blend of merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and offers light insulation for the cold. Panels with wicking FlashDry fibers wrap around the sides, down the center back and under the arms for exceptional moisture management. Body-mapped construction provides lightweight warmth without sacrificing breathability. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm top women is part of the Flight Series(R) collection. Reflective logo.
